Malice::
 
He nodded to her comment.  One less thing to worry about.  He had enough to worry about already, but this was a welcome relief.  They made good time back to base, and Malice had pulled Wolfblade close and put his arm around her.  he knew she hurt over their relationship, he knew Blacknightmare felt the same way.  But there was no good way to solve it without everyone being hurt, not that he could see.  So for now, things would have to remain as they were, and hope nothing turned sour between the three of them.  

Dark Mouse <raccoon7679@...> wrote:
Wolfblade::

She felt his hand clasp over hers and she smiled. "Well, at least they
are back. One less thing to worry about."
She felt  a knot in the pit of her organic processors move up to her
throat.  She kept a smile on her face for his sake, but she felt like
crying.  Soon she'd have to turn him loose to follow his other
beloved. But, to make sure he was happy in this mixed up world, it was
a sacrifice that she would make in a spark pulse. She walked back to
the base, at his side and smiling the whole way.


"HA!  Is that all you got?  You boasted such power, such skill!  Where is your power and skill now?  You disappoint me, ha ha ha haa!" 

		
---------------------------------
